page.title: 18A GAMEKEEPER'S WORK KNEESALL
page.content: He also told us that the incubator could hold a hundred and fifty eggs.Then he showed us some animals' tails.There was a fox's tail,a stoat's tail,a weasel's tail and some grey squirel's tails.These animals are {predators}of the pheasants.Then one of us saw a candle tester.Mr Todd told us that it is used to check if the eggs are fertile.Then we went out and he showed us some{traps.}The Fenn trap is legal and the Ginn trap is illegal. Then he showed us his guns. There was a shotgun and a long range rifle with telescopic sights.Then we had a look at his dogs.He had a Terrier for rabbiting, a gun dog, a Spaniel and an Alsation guard dog.David Todd is twenty two and he covers forty thousand acres for his employer.
